titleStmt.title: A true relation of the lamentable accidents caused by the inundation and rising of Ebro, Lobregat, Cinca and Segre riuers of Spaine together with a narration of a fearefull storme, which happened the third of Nouember, in the yeare 1617 in the hauen and port of Barcelona / written originally in Spanish by V. Rejaule the Kings aduocate ; printed by authoritie at Valentia ; and now translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Rejaule, V.

notesStmt.note: Added illustrated t.p., with title: Newes from Spain.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
